pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Wednesday, February 2, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

National Capital Region, Canada

Private meetings

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend the National Caucus meeting.

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will virtually attend Question Period.

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Canadian Black Scientists Network’s virtual Black Excellence in STEMM (BE‑STEMM 2022) Conference.

The event will be livestreamed via the following link:
https://youtu.be/Uv7-R6XC0-o
